DOC.brief_summary: This randomized field trial use self-report daily exercise log answer research question : Does frequency instruction influence tai chi/qigong home practice exercise persistence among resident Senior housing ?
DOC.brief_title: Tai Chi/Qigong Exercise Persistence Among Residents Senior Housing
DOC.criteria: Resident Senior housing , Ability engage mild exercise Vision sufficient view TV medium Willingness engage tai chi/qigong training practice . Unable provide inform consent Unable attend initial training session
